name: Cross the River
description: Jonas built a bridge. Can you cross it?

intro.speaker: Zoey
intro.text: Hi! I'm Zoey. I need to get to the other side.

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: Greetings. I am the Guide. The Architect, Jonas, has constructed this path.

intro.speaker: Guide
intro.text: Use the 'Move Forward' block to help Zoey cross.

hints.text: Drag the 'Move Forward' block from the tray to the workspace.
You need to move 4 steps forward. Try adding more blocks.
